byline.contributor: Rukmini Callimachi reported from Erbil, and Falih Hassan from Baghdad. Reporting was contributed by Omar Al-Jawoshy from Erbil; an employee of The New York Times from Mosul, Iraq; Helene Cooper from Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates; and Eric Schmitt from Washington.
byline.original: By RUKMINI CALLIMACHI and FALIH HASSAN

lead_paragraph: Planes dropped leaflets urging Islamic State fighters to surrender, and new concerns arose about hundreds of thousands of trapped civilians.

headline.main: Iraq Starts Offensive to Retake Western Mosul From ISIS
headline.print_headline: Iraq Opens Assault Against ISIS in West Mosul, With U.S. Help
